document.title: Reference for `eif_wean'
document.paragraph:
2SYNOPSYS
#include "eif_hector.h"
EIF_REFERENCE eif_wean (EIF_OBJECT obj);
2DESCRIPTION The eif_wean() function releases the protection of the Eiffel reference, which is protected by the Eiffel object obj.
2RETURN VALUE It returns the Eiffel reference previously protected by obj.
2CONFORMANCE ISE Eiffel 4.1 and later.
2SEE ALSO
eif_access(1) , eif_adopt(1), eif_protect(1).
